document.full_text: ubs ag's  global co-head of m&a, cary kochman, is among four senior bankers to leave the swiss bank on wednesday, dealing yet another blow to a firm grappling with an exodus of dealmakers.
document.title: ubs bankers join citi as talent bleed continues
lines_and_colors: ubs ag's  global co-head of m&a, cary kochman, is among four senior bankers to leave the swiss bank on wednesday, dealing yet another blow to a firm grappling with an exodus of dealmakers.
